name: WaveRider (dasPanjo)
description:
WaveRider is a music based game where you have to hit the notes at the right time.

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam 66

Movement:

A - Move left
D - Move right

Credits:

Music:

- Verblendet ( Soundcloud )

Programming / Visuals:
